message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $9000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're still a bit hesitant on the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can sell it to you for $12500. What do you think?
